# Security Policy

**PLEASE DON'T DISCLOSE SECURITY VULNERABILITIES PUBLICLY,
[SEE BELOW](#reporting-a-vulnerability).**

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 5       | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability within TypicalBot, please email
TypicalBot LLC at [security@typicalbot.com](mailto:security@typicalbot.com). All
security vulnerabilities will be promptly addressed.
